name: Mango Cardamom Raisin Multigrain Bread (vegan)
description: A sweet and delicious mango cardamom raisin multigrain bread. This bread is perfect for breakfast, toasted with some tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup hot cereal mix ((ArrowHead mills 4 grains + flax))
1/4 teaspoon cardamom powder ((cardamom is quite a potent taste, so add more or less by taste))

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 1/4 cup (60ml) water to a boil and add the hot cereal mix. Cook for 4-5 minutes.(Add more water if the cereal use up all and is not tender, depends on the grains)
recipeInstructions.name: Bring 1/4 cup (60ml) water to a boil and add the hot cereal mix. Cook for 4-5 minutes.(Add more water if the cereal use up all and is not tender, depends on the grains)

recipeInstructions.text: Let this mixture cool to a warm state and add yeast and sugar to the mix. Add in half cup bread flour and mix well. Add a teaspoon or 2 more warm water to make into a sticky mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Let this mixture cool to a warm state and add yeast and sugar to the mix. Add in half cup bread flour and mix well. Add a teaspoon or 2 more warm water to make into a sticky mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Let this mixture sit for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Let this mixture sit for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, Add in the bread flour, wheat flour, salt, cardamom powder and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, Add in the bread flour, wheat flour, salt, cardamom powder and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast dough mixture, oil and mango puree and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast dough mixture, oil and mango puree and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead into a soft dough. Add more bread flour or water if needed to make a soft not too sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead into a soft dough. Add more bread flour or water if needed to make a soft not too sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container. Spray oil on top and cover with heavy towel and let sit in a warm place for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container. Spray oil on top and cover with heavy towel and let sit in a warm place for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough a little, add in the raisins and fold and shape(flatten and roll) into a roll.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough a little, add in the raisins and fold and shape(flatten and roll) into a roll.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in bread pan or round pan and score the top. Spritz top with water, then with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in bread pan or round pan and score the top. Spritz top with water, then with oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with heavy towel and let rise for 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with heavy towel and let rise for 40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel, spritz top with water and bake at 375 degrees F for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel, spritz top with water and bake at 375 degrees F for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce temperature to 350 and bake for another 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce temperature to 350 and bake for another 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove bread from pan and cool for an hour before slicing!
recipeInstructions.name: Remove bread from pan and cool for an hour before slicing!

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy with hot masala tea or a snack!
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy with hot masala tea or a snack!

keywords: fruit bread, sweet bread, vegan bread recipe
